statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory
SELECT warehouse_id, product_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 1
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT warehouse_id, product_id FROM inventory ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100;
SELECT warehouse_id, product_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id IN (1,2,3) AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY warehouse_id, product_id;
SELECT warehouse_id, product_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id <> 2 ORDER BY warehouse_id ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT TOP 5 warehouse_id, product_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE location LIKE 'USA%';
SELECT item_name, quantity, warehouse_name FROM inventory JOIN warehouses ON inventory.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 3 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouses JOIN inventory ON warehouses.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id WHERE item_name = 'Chair';
SELECT warehouse_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouses JOIN inventory ON warehouses.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, sum(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouses JOIN inventory ON warehouses.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT warehouses.location, products.product_name, inventory.quantity FROM warehouses JOIN inventory ON warehouses.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id JOIN products ON inventory.product_id = products.product_id WHERE inventory.quantity > 100 ORDER BY inventory.quantity DESC;

SELECT warehouses.location, products.product_name, inventory.quantity FROM warehouses JOIN inventory ON warehouses.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id JOIN products ON inventory.product_id = products.product_id WHERE warehouses.location LIKE 'L%' AND inventory.quantity < 50 ORDER BY warehouses.location ASC, products.product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE warehouse_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM warehouses;
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT shipment_id, quantity, destination FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT products.product_name, products.price, shipments.quantity FROM products INNER JOIN shipments ON products.product_id = shipments.item_id;
SELECT warehouse_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products ORDER BY category;
SELECT logs.timestamp, logs.message, warehouses.location FROM logs INNER JOIN warehouses ON logs.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id WHERE logs.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
